thread.title: Katy Perry TOTALLY Takes A Shot At Britney Spears At The Grammys!
thread.title_full: Katy Perry TOTALLY Takes A Shot At Britney Spears At The Grammys!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Katy Perry TOTALLY Takes A Shot At Britney Spears At The Grammys!
text:
Katy Perry blatantly blasted Britney Spears for NO reason!! 
While being interviewed by Ryan Seacrest on the Grammys red carpet on Sunday, the Chained To The Rhythm singer snuck in some shade directed at the pop icon! 
Talking about mental health, the 32-year-old referenced when Brit Brit shaved her head after a mental breakdown in 2007. Watch the moment (below): 
Katy Perry no red carpet do Grammy: "Minha saúde mental está boa, ainda não raspei a minha cabeça". pic.twitter.com/cQM6yA3V3K — Britney Premium (@BritneyPremium) February 13, 2017 
Yikes! Why would you joke about that?? 
It sounds like Twitter wasn't having it either. See some of the reactions (below): 
"i haven't shaved my head yet"- katy perry throwin shade at britney spears #grammys pic.twitter.com/fE9tTKC1de
